pullRequest.title: Add the case where there might not be a superclass
pullRequest.bodyText: "extends" keyword is printed regardless if there exists a superclass or not. Modified so that "extends" is only shown when there is a superclass

afterCommit.message:
Adding case where supername == null

Signed-off-by: Dusan-Boskovic <dusan.boskovic@ibm.com>

afterCommit.message:
Add case where superName == null and avoid the possibility of returning a null value, which could not previously occur
